txt.en: 'Hail, [placeholder]! Your valour drove back Núrzum, but the forces of Isengard do not seem to care that their leader has fallen. They continue to swarm our lands in great numbers.\n\n'The enemy is especially strong in the Balewood today. Go there, and show them that Wildermore will endure!'
'Well done! You have driven back the enemies of Wildermore for the day.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Núrzum is dead, but the enemy still roams free throughout much of Wildermore.
The forces of Isengard can be found in the Balewood.\n\nYou should ride to the Balewood and defeat the enemies of Wildermore.
Ealswith is in Forlaw.\n\nYou should return to Ealswith.
